sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { addItem, minusItem, deleteItem, myObjofItems } from '../../Redux/Slices/cartSlice' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' // import { type } from '@testing-library/user-event/dist/type' type CartItemProps = { imageUrl: string, price: number, sizeCount: number, title: string, types: number[], id: number, typesCount: number } const CartItem: React.FC = ({ imageUrl, price, sizeCount, title, id, typesCount }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() // @ts-ignore const myObjofItemsM = useSelector(state => myObjofItems(id, state)) const typeNames = ['тонкое', 'традиционное'] // @ts-ignore const blockMinus = myObjofItemsM.count > -1 ? true : false const sizeList = [26, 30, 40] function plusItem() { dispatch(addItem({ id })) } return (

{title}

{typeNames[typesCount]}, {sizeList[sizeCount]}

{blockMinus &&
dispatch(minusItem(id))} className="button button--outline button--circle cart__item-count-minus">
} {myObjofItemsM?.count}
{price} ₽
dispatch(deleteItem(id))} className="button button--outline button--circle">
) } export default CartItem
